{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Edimax_EW-7822MAC |wikipedia = |brand = Edimax |model = EW-7822 |submodelappend = |submodel = MAC |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/20/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Edimax_EW-7822MAC |sernum = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = Mini PCIe |formfactor = (half) |vendor_id = 10ec |device_id = 8812 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = NDD9564781213 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812AR; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = [https://wireless.wiki.kernel.org/en/users/drivers/rtl819x rtl8821ae] |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = an+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/30/2013 |estreldate = 04/10/2013 |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This is the wireless module for the [[Edimax BR-6478AC]] router. ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
05:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Realtek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. Device [10ec:8812] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Realtek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. Device [10ec:8812]
        Physical Slot: 1
        Flags: fast devsel, IRQ 255
        I/O ports at 4000 [disabled] [size=256]
        Memory at f1d00000 (64-bit, non-prefetchable) [disabled] [size=16K]
        Capabilities: [40] Power Management version 3
        Capabilities: [50] MSI: Enable- Count=1/1 Maskable- 64bit+
        Capabilities: [70] Express Endpoint, MSI 00
        Capabilities: [100] Advanced Error Reporting
        Capabilities: [140] Device Serial Number 00-e0-4c-ff-fe-81-95-01
        Capabilities: [150] Latency Tolerance Reporting
        Capabilities: [158] #1e
